WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 03 February 2024
Condition of Rain:
Showers or thundershowers will occur at a few places in the sea areas off the coast extending
from  Trincomalee  to  Pottuvil  via  Batticaloa.  Showers  or  thundershowers  may  occur  at  few
places in the sea areas off the coast extending from Matara to Colombo via Galle during the
evening or night.
Winds:
Winds will be north-easterly or easterly and wind speed will be (20-30) kmph.
Wind speed may increase up to 40 kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending
from  Colombo  to  Kankasanthurai  via  Puttalam  and  Mannar  and  from  Galle  to  Pottuvil  via
Hambantota.
State of Sea:
The sea areas off the coasts from Colombo to Kankasanthurai via Puttalam and Mannar and
from Galle to Pottuvil via Hambantota can be moderate at times.
Temporarily strong gusty winds and very rough seas can be expected during thundershowers.
Rainfall amount (mm): Light: 00-12.5, Light to moderate: 12.5-25, Moderate: 25-50, Fairly heavy rain: 50 -100,
Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
